name: minipolish
description: A tool for Racon polishing of miniasm assemblies

positionalArguments.name: reads
positionalArguments.description: Long reads for polishing (FASTA or FASTQ format)

positionalArguments.name: assembly
positionalArguments.description: Miniasm assembly to be polished (GFA format)

options.description: Number of threads to use for alignment and polishing (default: 12)
Number of full Racon polishing rounds (default: 2)
